name: Xenomicrobiology simulator
description:
This game is an incomplete prototype.

You can simulate a bacterian ecosystem introducing minerals and cells into a container to produce interactions.

You can sell de products and obtain money to improve the cells or the speed of introducin minerals.

Do not press "space" or the game will reset.

This program was created to participate in #clickclickclick jam. For now I will not complete it to show my results in the deadline of the contest. But I'm still working on this project.
